sentences.cn: 比起拉丁语来,英语是不严谨的.

sentences.en: But they also say that even with today's imperfect science, the DNA is right.
sentences.cn: 但是他们同时表示即便今天的科学还不完善, 然而DNA是正确的.

sentences.en: Clearly, the boss - secretary analogy is an imperfect one.
sentences.cn: 显然, 上司 ― ―秘书的比拟是不完美的.

sentences.en: For satellites circling the earth, the law of areas is also imperfect.
sentences.cn: 对于环绕地球运动的卫星来说, 面积定律也是不完善的.

sentences.en: Human perception is highly imperfect and by definition subjective.
sentences.cn: 人的感知具有高度缺陷，而且天性主观。

sentences.en: I cannot endure listening to an imperfect reader.
sentences.cn: 我受不了那些发音粗俗的朗读人.

sentences.en: I saw several sugar canes, but wild, and for cultivation, imperfect.
sentences.cn: 我还看到一些甘蔗, 因为是野生的, 未经人工栽培, 所以不太好吃.

sentences.en: Markets, particularly markets for natural resources, are imperfect.
sentences.cn: 市场, 特别是自然资源市场不够完美.

sentences.en: Soot is the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.
sentences.cn: 煤烟是燃料不完全燃烧的产物.

sentences.en: Soot is usually the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.
sentences.cn: 煤烟通常是燃料不完全燃烧的产物.

sentences.en: the imperfect world we live in
sentences.cn: 我们生活于其中的不完美的世界

sentences.en: The perfect decks itself in beauty for the love of the Imperfect.
sentences.cn: “完全”为了对“不全”的爱,把自己装饰得美丽.

sentences.en: Their own techniques was at this time woefully imperfect.
sentences.cn: 当时,他们本身的技术也低得可怜.

sentences.en: They have a huge selection of perfect, slightly imperfect and discontinued cookers, fridges and so on.
sentences.cn: 他们有大量完好的、略有瑕疵的以及已停产的炊具、冰箱和其他货品可供选择。

sentences.en: Thus disequilibrium is a mark of waste, and imperfect efficiency of production.
sentences.cn: 因之,不均衡是浪费和生产效率有缺点的标志.

words.tran_cn: 不可能完善的；无法致于完美的
未完成体的；未完成体动词的
有缺点地；不完美地；未完成地
未完成体；未完成体动词

phrases.tran_cn: 不完全信息；不完整信息；不完善信息
不完全市场；不完善竞争的市场

trans.tran_cn: 有缺点的，不完美的，[语]未完成过去时的，[生]只有雄蕊或雌蕊的，[法]在法律上不能实施的
处理品，瑕疵品，[语]未完成式
trans.tran_en: the form of a verb which is used when talking about an action in the past that is not complete. For example, ‘I was eating’.
